attributes.action: Prevent companies from changing their 'Terms of Use' of contracts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many internet and mobile phone providers have a clause in their contracts that allow them to change the terms of the contract whenever and however they feel fit.

We feel that this is unfair on the public, as they may be tied into what has become an unsuitable contract.

We believe that either the clause should not be allowed, or the customer should have a 'get out'option if the terms are altered by the provider.
